name: The Last Slayer
description:
Game is still in development and in game characters and objects are for testing mechanics so they will change in final project! Overview

The Last Slayer is a story based platformer game where is the player controls a Knight who went an adventure for saving a Dragon from a Princess.  Players will be advance in the game while killing creatures and doing quests. 

There will be level system in the game and players can level up their character and make him stronger.  Also there will a lot of weapon to use while their journey. Main quest is killing the Princess and saving the Dragon.  But there will be a very deep  backstory in the final project.

The game start in a forest on a snowy day. Players have a campfire with them for start. Campfires can heal players if they are near to them.  And there will be a waiting wolf pack for meal. Players can kill wolfs and eat their meats for survive.

 And I made almost every object in the game interactive. So try to interact every thing in the game.

Controls

Movement: Arrow Keys

Z: Normal Attack

X: Heavy Attack (Unlocks at Lvl 1)

C: Item Pick Up

F: Interact With Everything

I: Inventory
